author: benh
msg: Fixed broken behavior of Lucid setup script with --ft flag (by using
cleaner code from CentOS script) and increased time given to ZooKeeper

author: benh
msg: Properly cast SlaveOffer* and TaskDescription* to jlong on 32-bit platforms

author: benh
msg: Added option for configuring swap space on each cluster node

author: benh
msg: - Decreased some of the default settings for Hadoop on EC2 to work better
- Increased timeout in start-mesos to make sure master is up before
slaves try to connect to it.
- Fixed a potential infinite retry cycle in Doug's code that would
happen if a node was unavailable (e.g. was terminated in ElasticFox)
